item.title: 千年资产不是你想的那样
item.description:
25年后的今天，这真是一个千年虫的惊喜 — 

。【原文：

Here’s a real Y2K surprise — 25 years later.

】

item.title: 特朗普的又一个任期即将到来。亚洲准备好了吗？
item.description:
在今天的 "亚洲大视野 "播客中，我们将介绍亚洲各国如何应对特朗普重新掌权—从提高关税到潜在的地缘政治冲突。

在今天的 "亚洲大视野 "播客中，亚洲各国如何应对特朗普重新掌权—从提高关税到潜在的地缘政治冲突。【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, how countries across Asia are bracing for Trump’s return to power — from higher tariffs to potential geopolitical flare-ups.

】

item.title: 特朗普获胜前一季度加密风险投资下滑
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的选举热潮重振行业情绪之前，加密货币领域的风险投资在第三季度大幅下滑。【原文：Venture capital investment in the cryptocurrency sector fell significantly in the third quarter before President-elect Donald Trump’s electoral surge revived industry sentiment.】

item.title: 比特币耶稣 "在西班牙岛上与美国国税局逃税案抗争
item.description: 对于他的追随者来说，罗杰-维尔（Roger Ver）被称为 "比特币耶稣"（Bitcoin Jesus），他是加密货币的魅力倡导者，这种货币正以破纪录的收益再次吸引着投资者。但对美国国税局来说，维尔象征着数字时代的一个新目标：加密货币持有者涉嫌在出售代币后未缴税。【原文：To his followers, Roger Ver is known as Bitcoin Jesus, a charismatic advocate of the cryptocurrency that is once again captivating investors with record-breaking gains. But to the Internal Revenue Service, Ver symbolizes a new target in the digital age: a crypto holder suspected of failing to pay taxes after selling tokens.】

item.title: 伦敦主要零售业空置率降至大流行病以来最低点
item.description: 伦敦主要商业街的空置率已降至 2019 年以来的最低水平，在经历了大流行病期间的实体店倒闭潮之后，这对房东来说是一大利好。【原文：Vacancy rates on London’s prime shopping streets have fallen to their lowest level since 2019, in a boon for landlords after a wave of bricks-and-mortar closures during the pandemic.】

item.title: 加密 ETF 提供商 Bitwise 收购以太币盯盘服务 Attestant
item.description: 加密货币交易所交易基金发行商比特慧资产管理公司（Bitwise Asset Management Inc.【原文：Crypto exchange-traded fund issuer Bitwise Asset Management Inc. has acquired Attestant, an Ethereum staking service in a bid to expand beyond its core businesses with the digital-asset sector seen by advocates as being on the verge of transformation.】

item.title: 顶级进口商称中国铜市场需要更多刺激措施
item.description: 据一家铜金属主要进口商称，如果要重振铜需求，中国需要采取更多的经济刺激措施。【原文：China needs to deploy more economic stimulus if copper demand is to revive, according to a major importer of the metal.】

item.title: 索马里飞地投票希望获得特朗普正式承认
item.description: 索马里兰将于周三举行拖延已久的选举，美国新政府有望支持该分离地区争取正式承认的运动。【原文：Somaliland holds a long-delayed election on Wednesday amid hopes a new US administration will back the breakaway region’s campaign to gain formal recognition.】

item.title: 邓普顿呼吁 5%的国债收益率与摩根大通和 T. Rowe 看齐
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿公司称，随着美国政府增加债务供应为数万亿美元的赤字提供资金，10 年期国债收益率可能攀升至 5%或更高。【原文：Treasury 10-year yields may climb to 5% or higher as the US government boosts its debt supply to fund a multi-trillion dollar deficit, according to Franklin Templeton.】

item.title: 越南科技冠军通过拓展日本市场加速人工智能发展
item.description: 越南软件和电信行业的龙头企业 FPT 公司计划明年在日本开设一个人工智能数据中心，利用人工智能需求的增长加速海外扩张。【原文：Vietnam’s software and telecommunications champion FPT Corp. plans to open an AI data center in Japan next year, capitalizing on rising artificial intelligence demand to accelerate its expansion abroad.】

item.title: 华侨银行首席执行官称该行有足够资金用于并购和业务增长
item.description: 新加坡华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.【原文：Singapore’s Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. has enough capital for deals and business growth, according to its boss.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "美国优先 "议程展开，全球市场颓势尽显
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在大选中获胜，使美国股市创下新纪录，并将美元推向两年来的新高。对世界其他地区来说，这不是什么好消息。【原文：Donald Trump’s election victory has catapulted US stocks to fresh records and pushed the dollar to a two-year high. It’s anything but good news for the rest of the world.】

item.title: Prosus 获 Swiggy 投资，首次公开募股估值达 20 亿美元
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）的最大支持者Prosus NV表示，该公司已从对Swiggy的投资中获利超过20亿美元，并继续强调其投资组合在中国科技巨头股份之外的价值。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s top backer Prosus NV said it has made more than $2 billion on its Swiggy investment as it continues to highlight the value of its portfolio outside of its stake in the Chinese tech giant.】

item.title: 软银支持的 Swiggy 将在 13 亿美元巨额首次公开募股后登陆印度市场
item.description: 孟买的一名 Swiggy 送货员。摄影师：Abeer Khan/Bloomberg【原文：A Swiggy delivery worker in Mumbai. Photographer: Abeer Khan/Bloomberg】

item.title: 韩国锌业在接受调查后撤回 18 亿美元股票出售计划
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.）取消了一项价值 18 亿美元的股票出售计划，而在此之前近两周，该计划的宣布曾引发股价大跌，并引发了韩国金融监督机构的调查。【原文：Korea Zinc Co. has scrapped a planned $1.8 billion share sale, nearly two weeks after its announcement prompted a selloff in the stock and triggered an investigation by the country’s financial watchdog.】

item.title: 印度 Swiggy 公司上市后需要向投资者展示钱景
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行在 2022 年扩张后裁员 10
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）在中国投资银行业务自两年前扩张以来进行了首轮裁员，在交易市场低迷的情况下裁员约 10 人。【原文：BNP Paribas SA made its first round of layoffs in China investment banking since an expansion two years ago, cutting about 10 jobs amid a sluggish market for deals, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 软银将为日本超级计算机提供首批 Nvidia 新芯片
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.）将成为首家采用英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）新型 Blackwell 设计制造超级计算机的客户，此举旨在满足急于在人工智能领域迎头赶上的中国日益增长的需求。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. will be the first Nvidia Corp. customer to build a supercomputer based on the chipmaker’s new Blackwell design, a move to meet growing demand in a country eager to catch up in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 精神公司即将达成破产协议，股东将被一扫而空
item.description: 在与竞争对手边疆集团控股公司（Frontier Group Holdings Inc.【原文：Spirit Airlines Inc. is closing in on a deal with creditors that would restructure its crushing debt load in bankruptcy court after discussions for a tie-up with rival Frontier Group Holdings Inc. fell apart.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后比特币涨幅超过 30% 后降温
item.description: 随着交易员们评估美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币的言辞支持对市场的影响，比特币的飙升已经暂停。【原文：A surge in Bitcoin has paused as traders assess the remaining market impact of President-elect Donald Trump’s rhetorical support for crypto.】

item.title: 中国三年来首次发行美元债券
item.description: 中国开始在沙特阿拉伯销售美元债券，这标志着该国自 2021 年以来首次以美元销售债务。【原文：China started marketing dollar bonds in Saudi Arabia, marking the country’s first debt sale in the US currency since 2021.】

item.title: Swiggy 首次公开募股考验印度快速配送企业的需求
item.description: Swiggy Ltd. 的股票将于周三在孟买开始交易，这标志着投资者对印度新兴快速电子商务行业兴趣的一次考验。【原文：Swiggy Ltd.’s shares are set to start trading in Mumbai on Wednesday, marking a test for investor interest in India’s burgeoning quick-commerce sector.】

item.title: 中国向全球银行家征求意见以提升市场信心
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国证券监管机构已加快了与全球银行互动的频率，将以往每季度一次的讨论加强到有时每周一次或临时询问，旨在收集对近期刺激措施的看法。【原文：China’s securities regulator has ratcheted up the frequency of interactions with global banks, intensifying what had been quarterly discussions to sometimes weekly or ad-hoc queries aimed at gathering perspectives on recent stimulus measures, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DirecTV 计划取消 Dish 交易，除非债务交换问题得到解决
item.description: 如果债券持有人不同意债务交换，DirecTV 打算在 10 天内终止对 Dish Network Corp. 的收购计划。【原文：DirecTV intends to terminate its planned acquisition of Dish Network Corp. in 10 days if bondholders don’t agree to a debt exchange.】

item.title: 澳大利亚工资增长放缓，凸显物价压力减轻
item.description: 澳大利亚第三季度工资增长放缓，反映出整个经济的物价压力有所缓解，并强化了下一步利率将下调的预期。【原文：Australia’s wage growth slowed in the third quarter, reflecting an easing in price pressures across the economy and reinforcing expectations that the next move in interest rates will be down.】

item.title: Pictet 在全球寻找不受特朗普政策议程影响的资产
item.description: Pictet Asset Management SA 正在加大对印度和其他新兴市场的投资，这家欧洲基金公司认为这些市场受唐纳德-特朗普政策的影响较小。【原文：Pictet Asset Management SA is boosting its investment in India and other emerging markets that the European fund company deems would be less affected by Donald Trump’s policies.】

item.title: 淡马锡信托向汇丰控股的泰科玛能源公司投资 5000 万美元
item.description: 淡马锡信托公司同意向汇丰银行资产管理公司拥有的一家日本太阳能公司投资 5000 万美元。【原文：Temasek Trust agreed to invest $50 million in an HSBC Asset Management-owned Japanese solar energy company.】

item.title: 美国 CPI 将再现坚挺，美联储路径尚不明朗
item.description: 预测人员预计，美国消费者物价月度报告将显示基本通胀率第三个月保持坚挺，这将使美联储未来几个月的降息步伐成为争论的焦点。【原文：Forecasters expect a monthly report on US consumer prices to show a third month of firm underlying inflation, keeping the pace of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts in the coming months up for debate.】

item.title: Kasikorn AM 称，特朗普时代或将提振泰国和越南股市
item.description: 据该地区最大的基金管理公司之一称，泰国和越南将成为唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的 "最大受益者"。【原文：Thailand and Vietnam will be among the “biggest beneficiaries” of Donald Trump’s return to the White House, according to one of the largest fund managers in the region.】

item.title: 石油价格稳定在 11 月低点附近，需求前景备受关注
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）因中国经济放缓而再次下调预期后，石油需求前景成为关注焦点。【原文：Oil steadied neared its lowest level this month, with the outlook for demand in focus after OPEC reduced its projections again on China’s slowdown.】
